participant_1.name: Alice
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and introspective, Alice often reflects on her life experiences and has a passion for creativity.
participant_1.background: I'm a librarian. I really like to travel. I have visited Spain a few times. I think I will retire in a few years. I am 60 years old.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and playful, Jake enjoys creative pursuits and loves to share joy with others.
participant_2.background: I produce music for artists. My pet's name is Charlie. My favorite food is pizza. I listen to rap music. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.
